Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model.chat

Class ChatMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model.chat.ChatMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrivateChatMessage
public class ChatMessage extends Object implements Serializable
Class representing a message. Public messages are instances of this class. ChatMessage is immutable.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • content

      private final String content
      String containing the body of the message.

    • senderNickname

      private final String senderNickname
      String that identifies the sender by its unique nickname.

    • dateTime

      private final Date dateTime
      Date and time the message was sent.

    • isPublic

      private final boolean isPublic
      Boolean attribute, that tells if the message is public. If true, the message is public, i.e. visible by all the players in the same game.
